page.title: 09A HOUSEWIFE'S DAY
page.content:
Mrs Hawley is a housewife who lives at Old House N.Cheriton .She has lived there 10 years. A typical day in her life is as follows
07.00 Get up 07.30 Breakfast (toast,muesli,tea.) 08.00 Household jobs 10.00 Coffee break 10.30 Goes into garden and does any gardening work necessary 01.00 Her husband comes home for his lunch 01.45 He returns to his work 02.00 She goes shopping or visiting friends,by car perhaps to Wincanton 04.00 Afternoon tea 05.00 She begins preparing dinner 07.00 Her husband comes home from work
